Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation of its unique features and benefits, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $18000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value for your investment while taking advantage of our current inventory levels. We are confident that once you experience the quality and performance of this product, you will appreciate the decision to acquire it. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you and enhancing your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
